website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for basic vanilla flavored ice cream to make in your home machine.
pros: Well-liked vanilla flavor by kids and adults alike
Easy to use – you only need to add milk to this mix
You can add fruit to the mix for a thicker ice cream treat
cons: Only for use with Rival ice cream makers, although some customers had success using off-brand machines and rock salt

customer_reviews.title: How it come and out  seems to depend on your ice cream maker
customer_reviews.text: Works better with ice cream makers that use rock salt and ice otherwise the ice cream seems to come out too pasty too me when I use my cuisinart electric churning ice cream And yogurt maker
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: ::::GrandKid Approved::::
customer_reviews.text: Got a few of these to go with the ice cream makers we gave the grandkids this year for Christmas. They loved it. Various fruits were added for a thick rich Ice Cream Treat.
customer_reviews.author: Nessmuk's Nephew

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: Makes great tasting ice cream without cooking. We really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lynn Seiber

customer_reviews.title: Yummy ice cream mix
customer_reviews.text: Yummy soft serve to make in your own ice cream maker. My husband and I recommend this ice cream mix. It had a good vanilla flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Fireworks

customer_reviews.title: ... little 2 gals ice creme maker and these are perfect when I want ice creme which is often in ...
customer_reviews.text: have little 2 gals ice creme maker and these are perfect when I want ice creme which is often in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: travelinggranny

customer_reviews.title: l love this stuff and this is the best price for ...
customer_reviews.text: l love this stuff and this is the best price for vanilla ice cream on ebay or ??. Great sellers - received fast!
customer_reviews.author: RGK

customer_reviews.title: Rich and creamy ice cream!
customer_reviews.text: I always use a cup of whipping cream in place of one cup of mild. Our favorite homemade ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: P. Puryear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cream vanilla ice cream. We used two packs for making ice cream in our 1 gallon mixer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: used it for a birthday party and made a special litte girl very happy
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Friday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great price to but this product any time of the year
customer_reviews.author: phyllis winstead

customer_reviews.title: It turned out real smuchy and taste was bland. ...
customer_reviews.text: It turned out real smuchy and taste was bland. I think the stuff they sent had sat on the shelf to long.
customer_reviews.author: gina price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have milk goats and this is the only mix I use.. It makes the creamiest ice cream
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and at a good price too
customer_reviews.author: John Lewis

product_meta.title: Rival Frozen Delights Creamy Vanilla Ice Cream Mix, 8 Oz (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Make delicious creamy vanilla ice cream at home with this easy to use mix!
feature_bullets: Easy to make - just add milk
Each packet makes up to 2 quarts of ice cream
Use with Rival ice cream makers
